jump_scares.spoiler: The handcuffed patient lunges forward in the bed
There is a slight jump scare as we get a sudden flashback to Arlette’s decomposing corpse in the well
A rat scuttles out from underneath a box
The bat creature comes alive and bites Tomaz
Magda is grabbed from behind
Magda is stabbed through the hole
A man opens the door revealing Eddie in his non-human state
The cop searching for the beast is suddenly grabbed
A man opens a closet door and a body falls out
A butchered body jumps up off the ground at Shigeharu. [Video]
There is a sudden growl
The creature growls and comes forward quickly
The cop is impaled from behind
The creature breaks through the window
One of the Heptapods places a tentacle on the barrier near where Louise is standing
During a dream where Louise is talking to Ian in her room, Louise looks up and Ian has been replaced by a Heptapod
The Heptapod places a tentacle on the barrier causing Louise and Ian to be pushed back by an unseen force
A dog runs towards Darrin
Darrin turns the camera and is startled by Raid
Darrin is startled by a water stream
A loud bang
Radek is suddenly pulled inside the door of the shack by an unseen creature
From a distance, we see the crocodile attempt to break out of the shack making a loud noise in the process
Lena and Dr. Ventress hear a rustling noise nearby
Sheppard is suddenly snatched away by a bear
An unseen person suddenly suffocates Clare with some plastic wrapping. [Video]
Accompanied by a sound effect, the scene cuts to Clare’s corpse on a rocking chair
Peter startles Jess by throwing some clothing on her while she is on the phone
Billy reaches out with his hand and grabs Jess’s hair
The beast grabs the father on the shoulder
There is a sudden thud
As the man reaches into the water to touch the parasite, it jumps onto him
A parasite walks onto the security camera and shrieks
A sheep carcass comes down from the ceiling
The hanging sheep moves
A sheep hybrid comes out of the darkness
The doctor turns on the lights and Belial is revealed to be hiding on the wall
Belial jumps out of the basket as it’s opened
The basket is opened and Belial starts screaming
Belial starts screaming
Bee gets scared by Greg climbing up the stairs
As Bee is looking around, David suddenly throws his body against the window behind her
After being woken up by Alice, Greg’s sudden move scares the group of girls
Sophie hugs Bee from behind
The phone rings which startles the family at the dinner table
Mrs. Graciella turns around and it is revealed to be Cady in disguise
Cady grabs Sam around the neck
Cady puts a gun to Sam’s head
A screeching bat-like Dracula suddenly jumps into the frame
Dracula suddenly breaks out of a box
Herbert yells “Boo!
Marc suddenly brakes the van after hearing a noise
Marc looks up to the car window and a man is on the other side watching him, which causes him to scream
A boy bangs on the car window, startling Carrie
A girl smashing into the window in front of Sue may startle some viewers
Carrie’s mother, who appears to be dead, suddenly gasps
(alternative ending)  As Sue lies on the surgical table after giving birth, a bloodied hand suddenly appears. [Video]
There is a sudden cut to a horror film on TV in which a screaming woman covered in blood swings a knife towards the camera
A phone suddenly rings
Enid walks into a room to see her mom with her back turned. There is a cut to Enid, and then a sudden cut back to the mom with her screaming at the camera
Sue reaches down to put flowers on Carrie’s grave however a bloodied hand reaches out of the ground and grabs her. [Video]
Alice becomes increasingly nervous as she walks alone through central park at night. A low growl causes Alice to look around and immediately after a bus pulls up in front of her. [Video]
Alice hears low growling and sees glimpses of a shadow as she swims in the pool, this builds to a sudden louder yowl which causes Alice to scream
Mary looks down from the railings to the first floor, and gasps as the camera cuts to the strange man staring directly at her from downstairs
The original Em suddenly appears crawling in the hallway
A creature comes into view in the crack
A creature jumps at Friend as he turns around
The creature snarls to stop Gunner
A creature suddenly appears in the view hole
After Father Simon says “Now,” the camera pans to the left to show Alan being pulled out of a bathtub by someone and screaming
Alan is suddenly shot in the head
A man gets sliced into chunks by one of the traps
A scary face flashes up on Casey’s laptop. [Video]
Cujo jumps up at the car window
Cujo jumps onto the hood of the car
Cujo runs at the cop exploring the building
Cujo breaks through the window behind Donna
A worm-like mouth flies at Layla’s eye while she is peeping through the hole
Hermann is hit on the head after the hole says “Remember, that was your dream.
A wooden board falls onto a glass window on the crane John is standing on (Foreshadowed a few seconds beforehand, but the impact is rather sudden.
In Doctor Thurman’s office, Donnie screams “I can see him right now” and, accompanied by a sound effect, the camera cuts to Frank who is standing in front of him
Ricky (one of the bullies) grabs Gretchen in Grandma Death’s cellar
There is a loud explosion on the plane
As Henry turns around to look at the baby there is a cut to the baby with boils all over his face, accompanied by a loud string noise
Henry’s head falls off as a wormlike creature suddenly pierces through it
A dog bark startles Jenny as she sunbathes
As a joke Steve scares Jenny in the tent
A car horn blares during a suspenseful scene
Lucy’s daughter appears in a dream and doesn’t appear to be human
Adrian startles Lucy while she snoops around his office
A sudden noise comes from the locked room when the family is eating dinner
As Jin-Seok is attempting to open the door,  his brother comes quietly and makes Jin-Seok scare
Jin-Seok is attacked by a frightening woman standing on his right
A woman screams
A neighbor says “hey kid!” as he’s trying to get into the cellar
The door slams shut
A hand unexpectedly appears on the bed
During a flashback young Jessie looks across the bed to see a scary looking bald man (the Moonlight Man) licking her feet
Jessie looks in the rear vision mirror and sees the deformed bald man

movies.title: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood

jump_scares.spoiler: Dan chopping wood with a machete makes a brief surprising sound effect
Jason bursts through the wall of a tool shed
A body hanging from a tree appears in front of Tina
Jason grabs Tina in a classic moment where the good guys think that it’s all over
One of the boys, who is wearing a mask, jumps at the other boy
A sudden shotgun blast may startle some viewers
As they touch the woman she reanimates as a demon and the music comes in very loudly
Jessica yells now as a demon
Some viewers might be startled by a loud gunshot as Ann shoots a zombie
A zombie appears in front of Ann as she flees the house
Some lights come on and an animal in a trap is seen
The old woman suddenly attacks from behind
Some children appear in front of Josh and Paxton
A shrouded figure grabs Josh in the museum
A corpse on a gurney sits up
Box 27 is opened, revealing the body of the man who was recently murdered
The guillotine blade drops
Professor Jarod’s face peels away
As Sarah steps outside, the homeless man walks right in front of her
Becky calls out to Cal. She turns around and a woman suddenly emerges out of the grass (this is accompanied by a loud sound effect)
After hearing a noise, Travis crawls towards the tall grass to investigate. He then turns around and Tobin is right behind him
As Cal follows Becky, Ross suddenly puts his hand on Cal’s shoulder
Cal looks across and sees his own corpse lying beside him (this is accompanied by a sound effect)
As the young woman and Jake begin to kiss, there is suddenly a cut to an old man watching them with loud echoing noises
There is an abrupt cut to JP breaking open a door
A knife pierces some wood
Anna suddenly appears behind Perry
The sight of various body parts in a freezer may startle some viewers
One of the statues falls over and then someone appears behind the gate
Someone says “help” and then a girl appears in the seat beside the driver
The three girls appear at the back of the room
The grandmother appears in the mirror
After a few seconds of droning sounds as the camera zooms in on the saleswoman, there is a sudden clinking noise that causes her to flinch
Jacob sees some birds flying above him at the party
Jacob sees a horn come out of Jezzie’s mouth as she dances
A sudden cut to a car braking and hitting a bike might startle some viewers
Jacob sees the reflection of his son in the mirror and reaches out to touch it however a demon head appears and he pulls back
A still shot of the ocean is suddenly interrupted by the shark jumping out of it
As Michael swims through the water, there is a cut to a moray eel swimming at his face/the camera
There is a cut to the shark quickly rising out of the water
Hooper looks into a hole in Ben Gardner’s boat when a human head appears from inside. [Video]
The shark jumps out while Brody is throwing bait into the water
The men begin pulling rope out of the water when the shark emerges
The shark slams into the shark proof cage

movies.title: Jason Goes to Hell: The Final Friday

jump_scares.spoiler: The woman at the cabin is startled when Jason appears right behind her
Diana is spooked when a police officer surprises when she goes outside to get ice
One of the cop characters is attacked by the possessed reporter
Freddy Krueger’s gloved hand bursts out of the ground and snatches Jason’s mask
Tom jumps out with a flashlight to scare Anne
Mrs. Fedder appears, yelling in the window
The face from Alice’s phone footage suddenly comes towards the camera. [Video]
There is a sudden glass shattering sound that startles April
April is grabbed on the head by the green demon
Ma bangs on the window as the group are about to drive off
Some eggs are thrown at Ma’s car window
While in Ma’s bedroom, Haley and Maggie are startled by a girl holding a scary mask over her face
A gas pump nozzle suddenly splatters a man’s face with gasoline (accompanied by a loud sound)
An electric knife turns on and cuts a woman’s arm (again, accompanied by a loud sound)
A lawnmower turns itself on
Seemingly dead man suddenly gets up with a scream
After entering the toilet, we see a figure in the mirror watching Dani. A few seconds later Dani runs out of the toilet and this is accompanied by some loud dissonant strings in the soundtrack

Josh is distracted by a person (who he believes to be Mark) entering the temple behind him. After he turns around and tells him “we’re not supposed to be here”, he is hit over the head by an unseen assailant
After witnessing Simon’s body being displayed ritualistically, Christian sits back up and a man blows some powder into Christian’s eyes
Paul wakes up and Annie is standing directly over his bed
Annie shoots Buster through the back with a shotgun
Annie jumps on Paul as he crawls away
A horrible face appears from around the corner as two men approach. [Video]
The lid of a barrel is removed to reveal a decomposed corpse

One of Susan’s employees shows her footage on her smart phone from a baby monitor. While looking at the phone, Susan suddenly sees a frightening image of Ray (the antagonist of the story she is reading) flash briefly on the screen
Reggie’s coworker opens the door, followed by a cut to a zombified man attacking him
Reggie turns around to leave and the zombified man suddenly jumps up from behind some boxes
After Marika begins to groan and enters some sort of trance, several birds slam into the window
After seeing some camera footage, Hori suddenly becomes very agitated
Some birds fly out at Kobayashi as he opens a sliding door
A sudden cut from a quiet scene where Kana is sleeping to an earlier scene where Hori is screaming may startle some viewers
Metal horse gets spit out by Jean Jacket onto Oj’s car
A loud thump comes from somewhere in the house
A ghost appears beside Maureen (it gradually fades in which lessens its impact somewhat)
A glass falls to the floor and breaks from behind Maureen
Several loud thumps over the next minute or so may startle some viewers
A man with a knife suddenly lunges at Nick
Alexia turns on the torch and shines it on her face in an attempt to scare Justine
Paint is thrown over Justine
Justine removes the bed covers to reveal Adrien’s partially eaten leg (this is accompanied by some sudden loud music)
The cat jumps up at Dan’s face
The body suddenly jolts upwards and begins yelling
Megan’s father abruptly hits his head on the window behind Megan
A hand breaks through the door while Dan and Megan are talking
A bat screeches and flies away
Colqhoun drops down in front of Reich
Reich suddenly grabs Boyd around the neck
Colqhoun falls through some wood and lands in front of Boyd
As Arbogast reaches the top of the stairs, a figure comes out of the bedroom and stabs him
Lila turns around the figure sitting on the chair and it is revealed to be the corpse of Norman’s mother, a few seconds later Norman rushes in wearing his mother’s clothes and a wig
The kids turn and see a body
A bottle tips over and falls on its own
An alarm goes off during a tense and quiet scene

While spoiling as little as possible, during a scene in which Amanda is in bed and Maud is next to her, Amanda says something that upsets Maud, causing her to begin crying. A few seconds later, Amanda suddenly springs upwards and her face looks distorted

Hard to describe without spoiling as it is literally the final shot of the movie, but can roughly be described as a scene in which Maud is lifting her arms and people are bowing down, there is a sudden cut to her screaming
The title appears with a music cue
The electricity suddenly goes out
Fanny suddenly says “Let me out!
Sudden music cue
The mailman is stabbed with a needle
The girl bangs her hand on the glass door
Asakawa suddenly jumps up from the table in anger
As Mai is walking towards an open window, she suddenly gasps loudly and there is a cut to Sadako on the other side of the window
The little girl leans forwards to reveal Sadako standing right behind her
Sadako’s hand suddenly reaches out of the rocks and grabs Mayu’s arm
Sadako pulls the curtain open and there is a cut to a close-up of her face
An emaciated man strapped to a bed suddenly begins to move, revealing that he is in fact still alive
A person with a mask appears as the lights flicker
The mask appears in the flame of the lighter before disappearing
A snarling figure appears
An elevator suddenly starts, propelling Norman and Beth upwards
Beth turns around and sees a mummified corpse
Holographic images of space appear in front of Beth after she taps on the computer screen
A sea snake attacks Norman
Dennis suddenly appears in front of the locker that Claire is hiding in
Claire is suddenly dragged off screen
Several sudden movements by “The Beast” as he approaches Casey from a dark hallway may startle viewers
As Aubrey closes the door a man runs up to it and pounds on the window pane
Aubrey closes her eyes and the screen cuts to black. A second later, the screen suddenly cuts back in to show the creature standing right above her
As Aubrey begins to doze off there is suddenly a loud flash of a woman undressing
The lights go out, and a few seconds later a red light comes on to reveal a creature standing right in front of Aubrey
As Sara flees down a hallway we see holes open up in the floor and one of her legs falls through
Dr. Klemperer’s wife suddenly disappears and as he looks around for her, one of the witches suddenly runs at him screaming
After a long moment of silent tension, The Riddler lunges at the man with a roar
While Batman and Catwoman are looking into the trunk, loud gunshots suddenly hit the car
In the wide angle shot, someone suddenly appears in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
Batman is startled by a cop who is guarding the crime scene
Harry goes out onto the balcony and sees a bloodied hand on the neighboring window accompanied by a high pitched scream. [Video]
(1:38:38) A sudden phone call may startle some viewers
(00:18:29) Oh Young-sook suddenly kills the police officer with a knife
A hand grabs Arkin from behind
A man jumps out of the box Arkin opens
A loud noise sounds after David closes a manhole and looks upwards at a shadowy figure
A shadow appears behind David’s son after his son spins the laptop around
Sophie gets abruptly tackled by something
David wakes up from his sleep to see a man bagging a human body on the ground. The body then suddenly jolts upwards and yells
Doctor Feinstone grabs Robbie from behind after he opens a door
Doctor Feinstone breaks the glass and grabs Jamie
Some scissors fall from a shelf while Carlos is filling his water jug
The ghost boy appears behind Carlos and touches him on the shoulder before disappearing
Carlos is surprised by his friends pulling the curtain beside his bed across while he is sleeping
Carlos looks out of a keyhole and an eye suddenly appears. [Video]
A demon form of Echo lunges towards the screen
The swinging Echo turns into Curt
Brundlefly bursts through the glass window of the hopsital room where Veronica is about to have an abortion
Brundlefly jumps down from the ceiling onto Borans
A hooded man walks past Liz in a corridor
There is an abrupt flashback to the four students partying in the shelter
Liz is startled by a knock at the door
Mrs. Jones suddenly appears behind Elliot
As Gloria approaches the car, she is attacked from behind
Behind Thomas there is suddenly a man in a mask
From the dark corner of the room a screaming man suddenly shoots out
When Thomas turns around, two people in cape stand behind him
The wind blows the window shut
Miss Giddens sees a face appear at the window
A thunder clap wakes Miss Giddens
There is a scream and the camera suddenly zooms in on a statue
A woman is suddenly shot in the head after saying “that almost hit me”
There is a loud explosion after a man steps on a mine
A pig suddenly drops onto the ramp startling the group
Martin is suddenly shot in the head with bloody results
Loud music suddenly comes on
A door is loudly pushed open
A loud voice can be suddenly heard from a scanner radio
Brent is grabbed by Lola from behind while looking down the hole
Lola’s scrapbook flies at the windshield while Holly is driving
While the camera slowly zooms in on Lola there is a cut to the car right in front of her when they collide
A fully possessed Mink jumps at the camera and screams
Mink is standing in the filed before attacking the crew
Mink pulls out a knife and attacks
A possessed person jumps out in front of the cameraman

movies.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer

jump_scares.spoiler: A loud orchestral note plays as Bob is getting tested at the hospital
There is a loud sound effect after Martin bites into his arm and rips off some skin
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers
Accompanied by a loud orchestral chord, Winslow turns around to see Wake towering over him
Water breaks through the window accompanied by a discordant orchestral note
Winslow suddenly punches the clock
Wake suddenly runs at Winslow with an axe (this is accompanied by a loud orchestral beat)
As Leilani and Jibran argue in the car, a cyclist suddenly slams into the windshield
After the two get back into the car, a man suddenly strikes the window pane and frightens Jibran
The scene abruptly cuts from Jim typing to a very loud gunshot
A body falls onto the concrete in front of Fingerling
Walter slams his fist on a metallic fence
Some birds fly up at Agatha
Maya closes a cupboard revealing Jurgis behind her in the mirror
Mrs. Baylock attacks Robert from behind as he stands over Damien’s bed. [Video]
Someone jumps out at Sam as a joke
Sam looks around the room and runs into a woman wearing a mask
Heavy breathing can be heard behind Grace
Someone knocks at the door startling Grace
The door slams shut on Grace
The children are hiding in a closet when it is suddenly opened. [Video]
The gator swims past the screen
Lucky barks as Day reaches towards the gator’s mouth
As Lizzie sits on a bed nursing her amputated arm, we get 3 short sharp flash backs to Lizzie screaming which may startle some sensitive viewers
Sun-ju opens the closet door and there is a quick flash of an image of Sang-Mi’s corpse
Sun-ju looks up from the well and there is a loud flashback to the scene of the old woman from the tape
The TV suddenly turns on
The man behind the camera hits the little girl with it
Ed hits the driving man with something
The lights turn on to reveal Ed’s reflection in the window, startling Tim
There is a loud cut to a dead body
Jerry opens the freezer to find Pam. She jumps upwards and leatherface runs into the room
Leatherface jumps out at Franklin when him and Sally are walking through the trees
There are several quick cuts to the twins lying in the hallway covered in blood
Jack jumps out and attacks Hallorann with an axe
The camera quickly pans to show a bloodied man standing in the hallway behind Wendy
The pilot is shot
Jake jumps down in front of the camera
Sergeant Howie opens a closet door and a girl falls out
Sergeant Howie opens a coffin and a man lies in it with coins in his eyes
Howie wakes up and sees a severed hand beside him being used as a candle holder
A person, wearing a hare costume, appears to get her head cut during one of the rituals
A figure in red passes by the base of a ladder
Lucius suddenly grabs Ivy’s outstretched hand as a creature approaches
Ivy falls into a hole
The creature with the red cloak suddenly runs at Ivy
The witch grabs Caleb around the head, revealing a gnarled claw-like hand
The witch turns around and lets out a cackle
The goat attacks William
As Thomasin reaches down to touch William, Katherine suddenly pulls her away
There is a loud noise from the roof of the house
A brief flash of a man’s bloodied mouth closing in on the camera may startle some viewers
There is a loud thud as a bird flies into a wall
There is a very short flashback to the Japanese man coming towards the screen
Fiona looks up and screams suddenly
During a flashback, a sock puppet briefly appears on screen accompanied by an electronic noise that may startle some viewers
Lisa backs into Jerry
A girl narrates about her respect for her policeman father, who is looking at the camera and smiling. Suddenly, his head explodes
The mutant jumps out from behind some cops
The man in the black coat walks past in the background accompanied by a string sound effect
There is a loud bang from a man’s truck as he reaches for his phone
A man bangs on the train window
A zombie appears at the window of a parked train
One of the burnt zombies lying on the ground twitches
When Gorr is walking slowly towards the camera, he suddenly appears closer
Gorr suddenly appears in a cage where Axl tells a story to the kidnapped Asgardian children
Sawyer bangs on the door and it is suddenly opened by an orderly (there is a muted sound effect as the door opens but the scene is not startling enough to qualify as a true jump scare)

After Sawyer escapes the building she hides behind a tank but the camera pans around to reveal David who attacks her from behind (there is no sound effect and the scene is heavily telegraphed which lessens the impact)
Roat leaps up from the floor and grabs Susy’s ankle. [Video]
Anna touches the door handle and receives a sharp electric shock
A sudden gunshot as Anna looks at a skull may startle some viewers
Anna jumps down from the tree and attacks one of the hunters
Anna attacks one of the hunters from behind as he talks to Sheriff Cooper
Dr. Barden is suddenly shot in the head
After a momentary silence, there is a loud bang as the dynamite explodes
Lucas begins talking to Iris but is suddenly shot mid-conversation
Some fireworks are let off, interrupting a conversation in a nearby car
A man is suddenly shot in a car
A sudden cut to a man firing a gun at a shooting range may startle some viewers
